short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Photo Editor provides a photo editing tool via a widget on your toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get instant access to photo editing tools. Effortlessly crop, rotate, resize, and enhance your images with filters. Adjust brightness, contrast, saturation, exposure, and other settings to achieve the perfect results. 


How to use Photo Editor:
1. Click the puzzle icon on your browser toolbar to access the widget
2. Drag and drop or upload a file to the tool
3. Crop, rotate, flip, resize, apply filters, and more
4. Download the edited image

Want to share feedback? Please fill out this form and help us improve the product for you:
https://photoeditor.net/public/contactus_cc.html

You can uninstall this product at any time. Please follow the instructions here:
